storyInfo: A strange group inhabits this city of ruin. They treat Skadi, a rare outsider, both coldly and warily. A clash ensues.

attributes.text: A city, life long lost, lies half-buried under dust and whiff of sea breeze.

attributes.content: This is the place on the map.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I can't say it smells any good.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: (He hangs his head low, and does not speak.)
attributes.name: Another Male Inhabitant

attributes.text: Nobody responds. Nobody so much as turns a head. Their eyes are open, yet all of them are motionless.
Their only trait unlike a statue is that they breathe. Long and slow, they breathe.

They are all human in appearance. Aside from being far too slender, and clothed in near-rags, they are indistinguishable from the Iberians met along the way, a far cry from the monsters Old José described.

attributes.content: Is this not how they speak anymore?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: Skadi subconsciously grips her case's handle.
Outside, she has her ways of making those who will not talk, talk. But it requires that the target comprehend her speech.

attributes.content: Moreover, I'm a singer right now.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: A singer doesn't do that. Mister José said so.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: A small shadow flits across the street.
With a fast step, she chases after.

attributes.content: A... child? He's mumbling a number.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: The child slips free of her grasp. With a flick of his head, he scampers down an even deeper alleyway.

attributes.content: Why take what's mine? Why bring me here?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: Skadi tramples directly onto a trap laid on the ground.

attributes.content: A hole, a few ropes. The ambushes outside were at least much more adequate than this.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I needed to find you, anyway. Quickly, if you don't mind.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.text: In the shadows, some few 'sculptures' come to life, slowly easing towards Skadi.

attributes.content: Quite, Sheetmetal. Such a person, I've never before seen.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant B

attributes.content: So you know how to speak after all.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I know not what a wandering singer is.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: Sheetmetal, do not speak to her.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant B

attributes.content: Your face, unfamiliar. Your attire, strange. You are not one from here. What is your business?
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: I want to ask a question.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Have you seen my fellow person?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: You have much strength. You are able to eat your fill.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: She came here before I did.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: An instrument is not a light thing.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The thing in your grasp, very uncanny.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: I assume your harps should come more or less the same.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Ears, pained. It is a weapon.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: It is able to not be.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Sheetmetal, this person, uncanny. Do not heed her. To speak, very tiring.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant B

attributes.content: Bench... Do you mean this child?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I didn't intend anything for him. He took something of mine. Things like that are significant.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'm only taking back what's mine. And looking for someone who can understand me when I talk.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Our child, you may not touch.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: Our things, you may not rob.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: Our rules, may not be broken.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: Sheetmetal, you have gotten nearer. What are you doing?
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant B

attributes.content: She is going to harm our child, steal what is ours, break our rules.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A

attributes.content: Is she not our sister? If she is, she too has a share.
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant B

attributes.content: I'll go and ask someone else.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Oh, it comes in handy after all.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Those from outside, to our place, you should not have come!
attributes.name: Male Inhabitant A
